amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture was not invoked on amendment SA 1407, as modified, (Record Vote No. 67) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 1407, as modified, not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 44. Record Vote Number: 67.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1407, as modified, presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 1407 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S1452; text: 03/03/2020 CR S1351-1406) In the nature of a substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 1407, as modified, not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 44. Record Vote Number: 67.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1407 proposed by Senator Murkowski.
